<<<<<<< HEAD
The purgacion of the ryght honourable lord Wentworth concerning the crime layde to his charge, made the. x. of Ianuarie. Anno. M.D.L.viii. Marckant, John.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
By Owen Rogers, dwellyng in Smithfield, Imprinted at London : Anno. M.D.L.ix. [1559] the xxviii. of April.
Signed: quod Iohn Markant. Verse - "Alas where is the man,". Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

By Owen Rogers, dwellyng in Smithfield, Imprinted at London : Anno. M.D.L.ix. [1559] the xxviii. of April.
Signed: quod Iohn Markant. Verse - "Alas where is the man,". Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
